translations: v.使合法化（legalise 的过去式和过去分词，等于 legalize）

sentences.sentence: Belgium legalised euthanasia four years ago.
sentences.translation: 四年前比利时也允许对病人进行安乐死。

sentences.sentence: It is illegal in most countries (though Sweden legalised the practice in 2009).
sentences.translation: 这种行为在大多数国家都是非法的(尽管瑞典在2009年使之合法)。

sentences.sentence: In surveys, more than 80% of Britons say assisted suicide should be legalised.
sentences.translation: 调查显示，超过80%的英国人认为安乐死应该合法化。
